sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO bal_translimit_his (UNIT_ID,JT_CONTRACT_NO,ADMIN_PHONE,OPER_PHONE,BEGIN_YMD, END_YMD,LIMIT_PAY,TOTAL_PAYED,OP_TIME,BAK1,BAK2) select UNIT_ID,JT_CONTRACT_NO,ADMIN_PHONE,OPER_PHONE,BEGIN_YMD, END_YMD,LIMIT_PAY,TOTAL_PAYED,OP_TIME,to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd hh24miss'),#OP_TYPE# from BAL_TRANSFEE_LIMIT where unit_id = #UNIT_ID# and admin_phone = #ADMIN_PHONE# and oper_phone = #OPER_PHONE# and jt_contract_no = #JT_CONTRACT_NO#
